description:
Figure 2 - 
              
          A General somatic morphology of Conothele daxinensis Xu, Xu & Li, sp. n. (female, XUC-2014-002+) B chelicerae, labium, coxae of palp and sternum, ventral view C left leg III, prolateral view D spinnerets, ventral view E female genitalia, dorsal view. Scale bars: A–D 1 mm, E 0.5 mm.
name: Figure 2 from: Xu X, Xu C, Liu F, Zhang Z, Li D (2017) Four new species of the trapdoor spider genus Conothele Thorell, 1878 from Mainland China and Laos (Araneae, Ctenizidae). ZooKeys 643: 63-74. https://doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.643.10543
